start: ^It seems that there is an interview between a television host and an interview ongoing. Do you want to watch?
interview: ^I think I speak for everyone when I say we are all stressed.
^So what can me, a normal person, do about it? Can we avoid being stressed at all?
^Well, stress is something we cannot escape. We will always experience stress in our lives because there will always be things in life that stress us.
^For example, students will be stressed with school. They might stress over projects, homework, and tests.
^In another example, adults might be stressed over their work. Or with managing their household or taking care of children.
^We can't escape stress. What matters is that we learn how to manage stress in healthy ways, while avoiding the unhealthy ones...
